title: [GAMEPLAY]Smite's new stack system is bugged; the CDR from Summoner's Insight does not apply.
body:
With the Smite Stack System intruduced in patch 5.1, 
the mastery Summoner's Insight (10% CDR for Summoner Spells) does not reduce the recharge time for Smite. 

** ** 

What it does instead is ~~reduce the 15 second cooldown timer between expending two charges by 1.5s, but that does pretty much~~ nothing (as of Patch 5.2, it doesn't affect Smite *at all*), and comparing with other skills it is quite easy to see that this is not intended.

Every other spell works exactly the opposite way; see Corki's R, Velkoz' W, Vi's E, Zyra's W, Heimerdinger's Q, Azir's W and Akil's R for reference: normally, the recharge time is the one that is affected.
I assume this was simply an oversight, considering that summoner spell CDR is only found in this one specific mastery and nowhere else.

** ** 

I really hope this gets fixed soon, because the way it is now, not only is it inconsistent with everything else, the points in Summoner's Insight also seem to be just wasted.
(And it quite frankly puts a needless damper on strategic diversity)

The only issue I can see with this is that it then makes it almost dangerously required for a jungle. If one jungler has the mastery and the other doesn't, the 10% cdr means the jungle who does have it has an extreme advantage in clearing and ganking, not to mention counterjungling.

There was nothing keeping you from doing that before. The thing is, then and now, those mastery points have to come from somewhere, which means you are making heavy  sacrifices in damage and durability. Different playstyles for different people.
This is not a balance issue, this is an oversight issue. I very much doubt Riot would suddenly ninja-nerf the utility tree on purpose.

Exactly this! 

All of my jungle pages so far have been 21/0/9 or 0/21/9, just for the smite and buff advantage.

The curent change is a big nerf for me.
Hopefully it can get fixed next patch, I love the Insight mastery and I need it in my jungling life.

For a second I thought you were talking about the Intelligence mastery (CDR on active items and spells), only because I have never used Insight before. I should look at the utility masteries more.

It's easy to see how this problem would arise because of the new stacking system for Smite and the fact that no other summoner spell has it or has ever had a stacking system, although Riot had to have seen this because they changed Poaching Smite to refund half a charge of Smite instead of refunding half the cooldown.

i don't think this is a bug, i foresaw this happening when they announced it because of the way the ammunition system was worded. the actual summoner spell cooldown is 15, so that is what is reduced with the mastery. 

i do hope it changes but im not banking on it
